This game is great but sometime the hit-boxes are weird 
but overall it's worth it
La verdad muy bueno. Excelentemente armado y muy divertido. Para jugar con amigos o soloQ. Tiene un par de cosas pero en resumen esta genial.
端游版第五人格，游戏模式本身就很有亮点，老鹰抓小鸡的游戏，百玩不厌。希望系统可以更加优化一下，技能更趋于多样性，并且打击外挂。那些在游戏开局的时候刷外挂广告的太无法无天了！

This game's amusement is entirely based on your code of Honour.

Destroy the Child, Corrupt them all.
Its fun but most of the new killers are annoying to vs.
Я купил эту игру для друга. Теперь мы вместе играем. достаточно хорошая  игра для своего жанра! Проще говоря игра TOP!!!
so sexy better playing the game then watching pornhun

4 years gone already ....this game still kicks good <3 ...always better with friends !

It's an okay game

26th November: But it is somewhat getting better

Played this game on console first. Switching over to PC made me enjoy the game even more. Way less toxic for starters. Except chat sometimes. Tunneling and face camping still a problem but what can you do people toxic af. So for new people I recommend to watch some youtube videos first to get a feel for killer and survivor unless you got some friends to guide you. Lastly this game is an abusive relationship sometime the game just beats you just like we all do to our wife. Other times you'll be dishing out the wife beating. yet you will always come back.
no balance, long matching time, macro killers(bots?), should delete flashlight
Alles im einem ein Gutes Spiel. Es gibt hier und da ein paar Fehler aber kein spiel ist perfekt.
it is ok, better with friends since teammates are idiots 90% of the time. Or just play killer :)
Lo encuentro adrenalinico, sobre todo al comenzar a jugar, muy entretenido mas aun con amigos. Se merece un premio <3
Re diver, pero anda como el orto
try tea-bagging in front of the killers in order greet them at the exit gate. they wave back at you in happiness because you did good in the game to survive :)
классная игра можно с друзьями вчером поиграть,  посмеяться и покричать от ужаса. Хочу сказать покупайте и играйте очень крутая игра респект
Great game, wish I had more friends :(
从最初版本玩过来的，看着服务器一步一步变得优化，很开心，要以前，进不去是常态，排队两小时玩一把
Killers are fun and survivors are challenging at first, but also fun to mess with the killer.
i really like this game because of the creatness of it
이 게임은 뉴비가 하면 안되는 게임입니다
Entretiene un chingo, y a veces no tenes ni ganas de jugar, nose si por su comunidad toxica de mi3rda o porq simplemente es repetitivo, pero entretiene bastante asi q tiene mi like

가끔씩 잠깐하기에 괜찮지만 한 게임을 사서 한 게임만 오래하시는 분이시면 비추천

its a game that relies on you knowing what to do before you do it, yikers.
Fun group horror game, whether it be as the survivors or the killer. Great times if you are playing with friends or some random matches online.

Fun game to play with friends and family. I don't agree with the matchmaking in this game, the ranking system has always been flawed from day one, by the Devs try their best and actively fix issues and create innovative mechanics to killers and survivors. It has been an overall great experience for me. Updates are continuing and expanding upon the initial idea, keep it up and this could become one genre defining game.
本来就好玩，需要理由吗？DBD天下第一！
Simplemente este juego me encanto aun tiene muchas cosas que pulir pero fuera de eso sus mecanicas la variedad de personajes supervivientes y asesinos te da para jugar mas que solo un rato
No puedo jugar como puperviviente tarda años y no busca partida

The current state of the game is not great, There are hackers in almost every game and barely anything is being done about them, The meta is stale and super unfun, and the SBMM is just bizarre and inconsistent. Not to mention the whole NFT situation really makes me regret buying the hellraiser DLC, Even though I really like playing as pinhead. Overall I recommend not playing the game until it gets into a better state.
buen juego recomendable jugabilidad muy buena genera igual terror al ser sobreviviente

Pretty fun game, shit my pants the first few times I met against the multiple killers. Not one game is the same, sometimes you're against an AFK Freddy who just is constantly swinging, the other you're in a 4-man survive with friends against a Micheal Myers with the Mori to kill your entire crew. Very enjoyable game, with or without DLC.

Jake Park mains rise up. Saboteur Gang.
Siempre errores, ahora no se puede jugar con amigos
Excelente juego pero cuidado con los hacker ya me tope con dos
I've only had fun in this game a few times in the past 1.5 years
Underrated game, very fun to play with friends and get spooked on.

- Нет! Ты не можешь просто ставить капканы и не бегать за нами!

me divierte bastante,pero mucha desconexion de la gente, como recomendarlo me copa bastante,te tiene bastante tenso de sobreviviente y de asesino  es complicado para mi cuando se ponen de acuerdo pero divertido, 9/10
Great fun. It's not the greatest in game balance, but the fun is undeniable. If you don't mind being fucked by rng in a competitive game every now and then!
O jogo é bom, pra quem gosta de susto, pra quem gosta de emoção e também é uma boa estratégica para fazer os geradores....
